website_summaries.verdict: Trail lovers who are in need of a breathable and comfy pair for summer hikes may want to take a look at this Columbia offering. It also provides lightness and versatility at an affordable price, qualities that buyers may appreciate.On the other hand, some may not find this low-top shoe to be an enticing option because it lacks arch support. All in all, the Columbia Ivo Trail Breeze may still present potential shoppers with handy benefits for adventures set in warm weather, as long as its default footbed is replaced with a more supportive variant.
pros: Almost every Columbia Ivo Trail Breeze review attest that it is an exceptionally plush shoe for hiking trips
Countless outdoor enthusiasts express their admiration over the breathability exuded by this pair
A majority of buyers agree that this Columbia product offers a lot of value for its price
The Ivo Trail Breeze’s lightweight construction brings a lot of delight to several adventurers who have used it during a hike
A minority of customers applaud its versatility for outdoor adventurers and urban environments
Around a handful of individuals rave about the traction given by this hiker
cons: A couple of Columbia Ivo Trail Breeze owners comment that they found its arch support to be insufficient
Some consumers dislike the restrictive toe box of this hiking shoe
A few shoppers detest the lack of darker colors available
As a result, it gets dirty easily

customer_reviews.title: Good...but
customer_reviews.text: Well made, comfortable shoe with aggressive tread....but be careful when soles are wet on slick surfaces, very slippery especially on tile, marble and polished.
customer_reviews.author: remlig

customer_reviews.title: The laces come untied every 10 seconds
customer_reviews.text: The main problem is they are 10 days old and already have threads coming loose... so I don't think my review will get better unless they make min. 6 months with me... riding and working everyday. also, a con is You must double tie your laces which isn't for me bc i Work and purchased them for Working and building pools. I work and daily I make it a Joke bc I never have to double tie my laces on anything else i wear. been 35 years since i had to double tie my shoes...
customer_reviews.author: KATE

customer_reviews.title: Descending rocky hills was difficult due to extra room in front of shoe
customer_reviews.text: I planned my first hike in years a few weeks ago, so I bought something that I figured could withstand at least a couple hikes. These did the job. They shoe is lightweight and mostly comfortable. However, there is just too much room for the foot to move around in the front. This was most problematic during descents, when my foot was sliding around in the shoe. Lacing them tighter wasn't much help. I guess I recommend these if you have sasquatch feet; otherwise, find another shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Jamestown 112

customer_reviews.title: the old man likes
customer_reviews.text: got these for my husband, he wears the same old shoes until they are falling apart, and he hates going shopping so I found these online, they looked good, didn't know much about the Columbia brand, but he seems happy about them, don't know how long they will last, but got them at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: A .Y. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Grips to the ground strong
customer_reviews.text: They fell very comfortable and I have sort of a wide foot and feel no discomfort in my foot. I've took them hiking already and they are really good at griping the ground the reason i bought these where for the same reason i was slipping and had close calls to falling because my shoes where not griping the ground good but these did and on the plus side they look great
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Garcia

customer_reviews.title: A very nice looking walking shoe!
customer_reviews.text: The pictures do not do this justice. They are beautiful and go with many clothing styles or activities. After wearing a few times I have received compliments on how nice they look. When people hear they are Colombia shoes they are surprised. These are very sturdy shoes that fit out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Dumas-Bell

customer_reviews.title: Just by and fill the comfort.
customer_reviews.text: As an always awesome quality, ordered it for friend and he wears 9.5 . In this model he suggested buy 10 for more comfort. But to have this ones is happiness, I have same one , color khaki and to wear them - is very comfortable and price is very nice. On khaki colors paid 28$ and just ordered white ones by 18.7$😍
customer_reviews.author: Nugzar

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so some shoes bug my little toe, but these don't. They are amazingly comfy. I've bought $120 shoes before, and these are wayyy better! Anyway, I think they're great. The best of this kind of shoes ive bought in the past four years. That should tell you every thing.
customer_reviews.author: CLEONBROTUS

customer_reviews.title: good for dry areas
customer_reviews.text: nice comfy shoe, and I love the grips. I did step in a puddle and I definitely felt it, otherwise I'll avoid much water in these
customer_reviews.author: S. O.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive
customer_reviews.text: Nice, sturdy looking shoe - - just too narrow to take my orthotics.
customer_reviews.author: grtpmkn

customer_reviews.title: The back of the shoes rubbed pretty bad above the heels.
customer_reviews.text: I tried the shoes for first time this morning. Thank. I don’t run but walk fast for long distances(11.2miles). The shoes fit well all around but as you can see in the picture the back of the shoes rubbed pretty bad above the heel. The bottom of the shoes protected the bottom of my feet which was a problem on the trail. I hope this will eventually give way with wear. Tomorrow I’m going to use Vaseline to reduce friction.
customer_reviews.author: sergio diaz alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking shoes
customer_reviews.text: I got these for Moab and they have been great. They help grip on the slippery rock and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & fit
customer_reviews.text: Super difficult to find a comfortable shoe for hiking, even more stylish like this one from colombia, it is extremely comfortable, I did a hike of 3h45min and I can guarantee that the product fulfills all its characteristics, without forgetting the delivery which is fast. I am satisfied with my purchase and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ugur

customer_reviews.title: Durability & Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Solid pair of trail shoes that are both comfortable & stylish. Purchased them for my 16 y/o son who had no complaints. That’s pretty impressive!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole s Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: More boot than running shoe
customer_reviews.text: The soles of the shoe are very firm and have great traction much like a hiking boot but the uppers are not as supportive as I would like since I use them for hiking.
customer_reviews.author: L.S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Being a cheaper style of shoe in the category, I'm pretty impressed. They are comfortable and didn't need any breaking in to be that way. My one complaint is that they don't have any traction on wet rocks on the trails, enough to the point that I wear my skate shoes instead when I do a rain hike.
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable, fits my regular shoe size as expected, and appear to be well-made. I just bought them so I don’t know how well or how long will last, otherwise I probably would give them a five if they last.
customer_reviews.author: JBinBR

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look great and really work well on your feet. They really are nice looking shoes as I have received many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Super awesome comfy shoes. Best shoes I've had in a while. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert Barguez

customer_reviews.title: Yes, they’ll get dirty. Who cares!
customer_reviews.text: They’re white. They’re hiking shoes. Who cares if they’ll get dirty, they were cheap and comfortable. Fit perfectly, and offer exceptional grip even in wet/slick environments! They handled Red River Gorge in Kentucky extremely well!
customer_reviews.author: C. Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Very light and comfortable. I wear them to walk for exercise each day.
customer_reviews.author: BlckHawks1

customer_reviews.title: One of the best shoe I've worn
customer_reviews.text: It's rare that I find shoes that I love. So far I love these!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Kammerer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for hiking! Comfortable and great grip for downhill runs
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes for outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.text: Great pair for the price. Looks stylist and are highly comfortable. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kratagya

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and couldn’t beat the price for a hiking/trail shoe
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Conway

customer_reviews.title: Hi...look at my review
customer_reviews.text: Really nice pair of shoes.....I already put about 15 miles on them....
customer_reviews.author: The serious reviewer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are ready for anything
customer_reviews.text: The grip on these shoes are insane. The compound is grippy and the pattern is great. I intended to use these for outdoor shoes in desert, but decided not to use these for hiking yet. I’m going to get real hiking shoes for that, and I’ll keep these for personal use since they are mad comfy and stylish. His name is Pupson. 8 month old Jack-a-Bee
customer_reviews.author: Fancy Feathers

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky
customer_reviews.text: The shoes do look nice, however on first use appear to be making lot of squeaky noise on a wooden floor. Further the grip at the back is not at all comfortable when walking . While the grip control looks great , the bottom is too firm and you can feel its not helping provide a comfort feel during the walk.. Size was just right fit though!
customer_reviews.author: Subash Adigal

customer_reviews.title: Feels and fits great!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find size 15 thats cheap, has ridiculous grip, and fits correctly. Colombia nailed it! Feels great and grips to about any surface
customer_reviews.author: Jay B

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I struggled to find shoes I liked for twice the price. These are comfortable; I've worn them for several hours without discomfort. I haven't had them long enough to see what their traction is like in mud/rain, but so far, they seem good.
customer_reviews.author: Crom71

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This comes ready to use. Fits perfectly. Can take out of box and hit the trails.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Berens

customer_reviews.title: This shoe delivers
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly, comfortable and waterproof while walking through wet grass.
customer_reviews.author: joe roedl

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Shoes is comfortable to wear and the size is what they say it is
customer_reviews.author: Tom Calabazaron

customer_reviews.title: Good hiking shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is the first pair of Columbia shoes that I've tried and so far am in really happy with my initial impressions. They're comfortable, breathable, and have good traction. They do a run a bit slim, so I had to loosen the lace and that seemed to help, but probably would want to use thinner socks. I like how rigid the sole of the shoe is and it provides good stability over uneven terrain. Looking forward to many more hikes with these shoes and hope they last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: dezymondTop Contributor: Pets

product_meta.title: Columbia Men's Error:# Walking Shoe
product_meta.description: This lightweight Columbia cotton poplin shorts allows you to enjoy the warmth of the summer in the greatest comfort. Versatile, it is casual enough for your outdoor activities, while being stylish enough for work and city trips. Available in a variety of colours to match your favourite shirts and t-shirts.
feature_bullets: Techlite lightweight midsole for long lasting comfort, superior cushioning, and high energy return
Open mesh upper with suede and synthetic leather overlays
